channel.title: Projects on Milad Shafiee
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Milad Shafiee

item.title: Master Thesis
item.description: Push recovery of a humanoid robot under severe external disturbance 2013 – 2015 I passed my master thesis under the supervision of Prof. Aghil Yousefi-Koma and my goal was to employ whole capability of a biped robot for balance recovery. In this regard my work can be devided into two parts. + I developed a human-inspired feedback controller for push recovery of Mini-SURENA humanoid robot + We deploy model predictive control and concept of Divergent Component of motion to developing a Push recovery Controller.

item.title: Selected Undergraduate Projects
item.description: Reducing effects of joints clearance on the behavior of the parallel manipulators(A Part of Bachelor Thesis) 2013 – 2015 I passed my bachelor thesis under the supervision of Prof.Daniali about the dynamic analysis of the mechanical system. As a part of my bachelor thesis, with collaboration with Dr.Varedi, we analyzed the effect of clearance Joints on the performance of the parallel robot. Clearance imposes some uncontrollable degrees of freedom to a manipulator.
